original_title: Princess Anne to visit the Temple of the Tooth Relic
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Her Royal Highness The Princess Royal, Princess Anne, is scheduled to visit the Temple of the Tooth Relic in Kandy on Thursday (11) to receive blessings.
Princess Anne will then visit the Jaffna Public Library and engage in an observation tour of the demining and resettlement site in Muhamalai.
She is due to visit several places including the Commonwealth War Graves Commission, Pillaiyar Kovil in Colombo and the British Council on Friday (12).
Her Royal Highness The Princess Royal, Princess Anne, and Vice Admiral Sir Tim Laurence arrived in Sri Lanka on Wednesday (10) for a three-day official visit.
Princess Anne visited the country at the invitation of the government, marking the 75th anniversary of diplomatic relations between Sri Lanka and the United Kingdom.
